column4: Join me on Saturday, October 31, 2020, as I, along with other esteemed health care professionals, will will be inducted as Fellows of the @AAN_Nursing. You can join the free live stream this Saturday, October 31 from 4:30 P.M. to 7:00 P.M. CDT here: https://t.co/8sLby37ICB

The #COVID19 crisis has put a spotlight on what we've known for decades: our nation has failed to prioritize the needs of working mothers. We need real solutions for the 'she-session' brought from the pandemic, like the ones the House passed in the #HEROESAct #momsbailout

Join me this week in celebrating the 48th anniversary of the Clean Water Act. Since 1972, the Clean Water Act has safeguarded America’s lakes, streams, wetlands, and tributaries from pollution, and has protected public health. #CWA48 https://t.co/NoSrMrSRbX
